title: MongoDB Chat Memory
description: Stores the chat history in MongoDB collection.

x-enumDescriptions: Looks for an input field called 'sessionId' that is coming from a directly connected Chat Trigger
Use an expression to reference data in previous nodes or enter static text

sessionKey.description: The key to use to store session ID in the memory

collectionName.description: The collection name to store the chat history in. If collection does not exist, it will be created.

databaseName.description: The database name to store the chat history in. If not provided, the database from credentials will be used.
